index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE changing the name of the Department of Design, Construction and Land Use to the Department of Planning and Development; amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 3.06 to reflect this change and changing a fund name to reflect this change; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.60.908 and 23.84.008 to reflect this name change; updating other obsolete references throughout the Seattle Municipal Code; and authorizing the Code Reviser to make changes over time to all references elsewhere in the Seattle Municipal Code necessary to reflect the name change.
